name: gplus_bell_replacer
description:
Change the Google+ notification bell to specified image (url).
You can put an animated GIF here to make it more interesting. Have fun!

If you have any question, I'm here: http://gplus.to/ysmood
additional_info:
Jun 26 2013 ver 0.5 - Update after G+ has changed its style.
Jun 26 2013 ver 0.4 - Update after G+ has changed its style.
Jun 26 2013 ver 0.3 - Fix rectangle image stretch bug.
Jun 25 2013 ver 0.2 - Add support for FIrefox. Special thanks for the idea of e-neko.
Jun 24 2013 ver 0.1 - Base.

Jun 2013 http://ysmood.org
